授業目的: The aim of this course is to equip students with the skills and confidence necessary to research, plan and compose an academic paper. Due to the corona virus situation there may be some changes to both content and schedule.
到達目標: The aim of this course is to equip students with the skills and confidence necessary to research, plan and compose an academic paper.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Students can only learn by being involved. The instructor will guide but it is up to the student to observe and learn.
